snippet: Nigerian separatists threatened to blow up a merchant ship if the authorities do not release a separatist leader seeking the independence of Biafra.
abstract: Nigerian separatists hijack merchant ship and threaten to blow it up if authorities do not release leader Nnamdi Kanu within 31 days.
lead_paragraph: Nigerian separatists threatened to blow up a merchant ship if the authorities do not release a separatist leader seeking the independence of Biafra.

headline.main: Nigeria: Ship’s Hijackers Make a Threat
headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Ship’s Hijackers Make a Threat
